context: <user> I need a train departing from cambridge arriving by 17:45. <system> Okay! What is your destination? <user> I would like to go to Stansted Airport, please. <system> On what day do you need to travel from cambridge to stansted airport? <user> I need to travel on Friday. Could you give me the travel time, price and train ID? <system> Yes the train that departs at 16:40 has an ID of TR7062, and a travel time of 28 minutes and a price of 10.10 pounds. <user> Thank you! I'm also looking for a place to stay in the north. I'll need it to have a star of 2. <system> We have two options that meet your criteria. Both have free parking and wifi. I would recommend Ashley Hotel. Will that work for you?<user> That sounds great, thanks! <system> Would you like me to book it for you?<user> Actually, I am not ready to book yet. But, can you please tell me the phone number and postcode? <system> sure phone is 01223350059 and the postcode is cb41er, anything else today?<user> No that's all I need for now. Thank you! <system> You're welcome! Have a great trip!<user> Thank you so much! Goodbye. <system>
